entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
